channel.title: Cerberus of the Bloodsea
channel.description:
This is another one of my models. I personally think it is my best one, as with this I aimed for more realism instead of how good it looks. There are no glitched faces that I know of. If you see one, please point it out. The red/silver is a rusted iron texture. And the blade and inner wings on the hilt are just plain iron textures, but it doesn't particularly look like a texture. I have posted quite a few pictures to show how the red part along the blade is a bit higher than the blade itself - and how it is also connected to the hilt.
Cerberus - Whole view: [img]http://i31.tinypic.com/jtuiox.jpg[/img]
Cerberus - Blade view: [img]http://i32.tinypic.com/33nhzbs.jpg[/img]
Cerberus - Hilt view: [img]http://i32.tinypic.com/2my44dz.jpg[/img]
Cerberus - Switch view: [img]http://i30.tinypic.com/53021f.jpg[/img]
If you would like me to post more angels of this, just post and say so.

item.title: Cerberus of the Bloodsea
item.description:
@14-08 wrote:

No problem.

Tbh, i don’t Model or have anything to do wth Coding anymore. I’m just here to Post my Thoughts and help people with my knowledge. I used to model but as Some people here take The forums seriously, they’d rather flame. So i quit, i hope this doesn’t ever happen to you Wink. But no worries, you’ll be fine Big Grin

Yeah, I used to code quite a lot. but i gave that up and got into modeling. i tried out Blender and I couldn’t be bothered learning how to use it, so I am just going to stick with Meta. And thanks for your feedback.

NO to the texture, looks terrible, not ur fault tho, blame meta. make handle wider, its like a twig. smoothen out the blade edges, too obviously traced. Something just doesnt look right on it... hmmm, i think its that the hilt is soo wide compared to the length of the handle, you gotta try n balance it out so it looks better. I.E. wide hilts should have long handles so it doesnt look flimsy | |=== is bad |

|
|======O looks more proper.
|

Oh and add a pummel
I do liek the diff. levels in the model, its not just a flat sword with an edge so gj there.

Thanks a lot. I will add a pummel soon and upload a few pictures when I do. I thought of making the handle rather long, but I usually get told that the handle is too long when I do that.

Thanks so much for the feedback, too. I will add a pummel and smooth out the edges - like you said. And I will replace the pictures when i do.

Read full topic
